oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anthony Medley interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medley, Anthony; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Anthony Medley served with the 3rd Battalion, 7th Marines, 1st Marine Division in Vietnam from March 1969 to January 1970. He retired as a lieutenant colonel in 1994.
